entry.name: showOnlyCurrentScreen
entry.label: Whether to show only window tasks that are on the same screen as the widget.

entry.name: showOnlyCurrentDesktop
entry.label: Whether to only show tasks that are on the current virtual desktop.

entry.name: showOnlyCurrentActivity
entry.label: Whether to show only tasks that are on the current activity.

entry.name: showOnlyMinimized
entry.label: Whether to show only window tasks that are minmized.

entry.name: unhideOnAttention
entry.label: Whether to unhide if a window wants attention.

entry.name: groupingStrategy
entry.label: How tasks are grouped: 0 = Do Not Group, 1 = By Program Name

entry.name: groupedTaskVisualization
entry.label: What happens when clicking on a grouped task: 0 = cycle through grouped tasks, 1 = try to show tooltips, 2 = try to show present Windows effect, 3 = show textual list (AKA group dialog)

entry.name: groupPopups
entry.label: Whether groups are to be reduced to a single task button and expand into a popup or task buttons are grouped on the widget itself.

entry.name: onlyGroupWhenFull
entry.label: Whether to group always or only when the widget runs out of space to show additional task buttons comfortably.

entry.name: groupingAppIdBlacklist
entry.label: The id's (usually .desktop file names) of applications that should not have their tasks grouped.

entry.name: groupingLauncherUrlBlacklist
entry.label: The launcher URLs (usually .desktop file or executable URLs) of applications that should not have their tasks grouped.

entry.name: sortingStrategy
entry.label: How to sort tasks: 0 = Do Not Sort, 1 = Manually, 2 = Alphabetically, 3 = By Desktop, 4 = By Activity

entry.name: separateLaunchers
entry.label: Whether launcher tasks are sorted separately at the left side of the widget or can be mixed with other tasks.

entry.name: maxStripes
entry.label: The maximum number of rows (in a horizontal-orientation containment, i.e. panel) or columns (in a vertical-orientation containment) to layout task buttons in.

entry.name: forceStripes
entry.label: Whether to try and always layout task buttons in as many rows/columns as set via maxStripes.

entry.name: showToolTips
entry.label: Whether to show tooltips when hovering task buttons.

entry.name: wheelEnabled
entry.label: Whether using the mouse wheel with the mouse pointer above the widget should switch between tasks.

entry.name: wheelSkipMinimized
entry.label: Whether to skip minimized tasks when switching between them using the mouse wheel.

entry.name: highlightWindows
entry.label: Whether to request the window manager highlight windows when hovering corresponding task tooltips.

entry.name: launchers
entry.label: The list of launcher tasks on the widget. Usually .desktop file or executable URLs. Special URLs such as preferred://browser that expand to default applications are supported.

entry.name: middleClickAction
entry.label: What to do on middle-mouse click on a task button.

entry.name: indicateAudioStreams
entry.label: Whether to indicate applications that are playing audio including an option to mute them.

entry.name: fill
entry.label: Whether task manager should occupy all available space.

entry.name: taskHoverEffect
entry.label: Whether task buttons should change in appearance when the mouse pointer is above them.

entry.name: maxTextLines
entry.label: The maximum number of text lines to show in a task button. 0 means no limit.

entry.name: minimizeActiveTaskOnClick
entry.label: Whether to minimize the currently-active task when clicked. If false, clicking on the currently-active task will do nothing.

entry.name: reverseMode
entry.label: Whether to grow the tasks in according to system configuration or opposite to system configuration.

entry.name: iconSpacing
entry.label: Spacing between icons in task manager. Margin is multiplied by this value.
